title: YouTube Music for Wear OS rolls out ‘Recently Played’ tile
content:
As we previously spotted, YouTube Music’s ‘Recently Played’ Wear OS tile is now available to let you quickly start listening to a previous album/song on your watch.

more…

The post YouTube Music for Wear OS rolls out ‘Recently Played’ tile appeared first on 9to5Google.
